import React from "react"; import crypto from 'crypto-js'; import { dict } from "../../Dict"; import Moment from 'react-moment'; import 'moment-timezone'; import moment from 'jalali-moment' const MeetingCard = (props) => { const t = dict['fa'] function meetingItems() { var result = [] props.meetings.map((meeting) => { result.push(
JL
{meeting.title}

{moment(meeting.start_time, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:mm').locale('fa').format('HH:mm YYYY/MM/DD')}
) }) return result } return (

Meetings

{meetingItems()}
) } export default MeetingCard;
